mapper.insert: insert into t_cloud_bean_use_record_detail (id, uid, enterprise_id, order_id , start_time , end_time,total_use_day,rent_record_detail , tenant_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{id}, #{uid},#{enterpriseId}, #{orderId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{totalUseDay}, #{rentRecordDetail}, #{tenantId},#{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into t_cloud_bean_use_record_detail (id, uid, enterprise_id, order_id , start_time , end_time,total_use_day,rent_record_detail , tenant_id, create_time, update_time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.uid},#{item.enterpriseId}, #{item.orderId}, #{item.startTime}, #{item.endTime}, #{item.totalUseDay}, #{item.rentRecordDetail}, #{item.tenantId},#{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime})
